attributes.action: Request for Parking Permits for Working Families in Oakland Rise NW10 6fN
attributes.additional_details: Providing parking permits to residents will help manage parking spaces more effectively,This will make the community more accessible,working families in our community juggle multiple responsibilities, including work, childcare, &other daily tasks.offering parking P. the authority can ease their burden,allowing them to focus on their work without the stress of finding a parking space.Enhanced Safety When residents struggle to find parking, they are more likely park in unsafe or illegal locations.
attributes.background: Parking permits for working families Our community with a large proportion of working families who rely on their vehicles for commuting to work, transporting children,Despite the growing population and the rising No.of working families, our community faces significant parking challenges.

rejection.details: You may wish to contact your local MP, you can do so here: https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/contact-an-mp-or-lord/contact-your-mp/
